name: TowerDefense (AmiralHartman)
description:
You are the evil Leo, kill the students before they can reach your castle !

Click on a turret in the bottom-left box and place it on a spot to buy it,

You can check your current credits on the top of your screen,

If even you get bored of playing, hit the "quit" button to exit the game

For reasons of compilation issues, the .exe file (Windows version) is not working properly, please use the Linux version for any playtest
